history.proof: hauto lq: on drew: off use: Cplus_assoc, Cplus_0_l, Cplus_0_r, Cplus_comm, Cplus_opp_r, Copp_plus_distr unfold: Cminus.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of RtoC_minus (RtoC (_ - _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment z1, z2 : C H : - (z1 - z2) = - (z1 + - z2) Unable to unify "z2 - z1" with "- (z1 + - z2)".

original: assert (H: - (z1 - z2) = - (z1 + - z2)). { rewrite Copp_plus_distr. reflexivity. } rewrite H. rewrite RtoC_minus. reflexivity.
